need.title: Need a hand?
need.text: If you need any help or have questions about Devart tools or purchasing options, do not hesitate to get in touch with us.

start.title: Get started with SQL Complete at no cost
start.text: Download a FREE trial version and see how much time you can save on your coding and database deployment today.

licenses.title: Buy multiple licenses with a substantial discount
licenses.text: We provide flexible purchase options, including bulk discounts, to meet the budget of each and every customer.
